text: After photos of George and Amal Clooney ’ s twins surfaced in a French magazine, our sources say the A - lister is frantic over his children ’ s safety! Few celebs are as private as George, 56, and Amal Clooney, 39. So when a photographer recently got onto their property in Lake Como, Italy to snap photos of their twin babies, Ella and Alexander, it drove the movie star right up the wall! Not only is George considering pressing charges against Voici, the French magazine that acquired the images, our insider says the incident has him terrified and considering scaling up security for his family!
